name: Virus by Dan
description:
virus, by dan

This is my second program in my life. I'm not a programmer nor do I pretend to be one. I wasn't satisfied at all with brain breaking balls because it only works fine on a MSX TurboR. So I tried to write a similar game playable on an MSX1.

The game works on an MSX1. Please be patient until the game is completely loaded. It can be played at https://webmsx.org/?STATE_URL=https://drive.google.com/u/0/uc?id=1n101BhDVaWNpVn...

Instructions. Avoid infection by using cell defenses so that the viruses don't get into the cells. Use space & cursor keys to move defenses. Don't let your blood get green and hope the vaccine will arrive on day 30… Thanks!
